title: Canon PowerShot SX740 HS 20.3MP Digital Camera 4K WiFi Bluetooth Black
description: This Canon PowerShot SX740 HS digital camera is a great addition to your photography collection. With its 20.3MP maximum resolution and 4K video recording feature, you can capture stunning photos and videos. The camera has a 3.0" screen size and is equipped with Bluetooth and Wi-Fi ready features for easy connectivity. TESTED. IT COMES WITH A BATTERY AND A CHARGER. NO MEMORY CARD. THERE ARE SOME FEW SCRATCHES ON THE SCREEN.
